name: Dungeon Runner! LITE
description:
NOTE: Product contains ads to 3rd party software, of which NC Indie has no affiliation to, and will not be held responsible for any of third party ads displayed.

SUMMARY

Dungeon Runner is a First Person 3D endless runner. The aim of the game is to collect as many coins and survive as long in the dungeon as possible. Avoiding traps and death falls along the way.

Features:

  • Google Play Game Service.
  • Google Play Achievements.
  • Google Play Leaderboards.
  • Mobile thumbstick and jump function.
  • Incredibly addictive - just one more go - game play!
  • Score/Timer function
  • Randomly spawned Power Up's that increase score
  • More coming soon!
